description: The 27-year-old suspect, Akayed Ullah, is in the hospital.
maintext:
Explosive detonates below NYC transit hub in 'attempted terrorist attack'
The 27-year-old suspect, Akayed Ullah, was badly injured in the arm and torso from the explosion that went off in his arms, sources said.
title: NYC terror suspect's family 'heartbroken' by attack
